Source.Name: perl-extutils-depends
Source.Summary: ExtUtils::Depends - Easily build XS extensions that depend on XS extensions
Source.Description: This module tries to make it easy to build Perl extensions that use functions and typemaps provided by other perl extensions. This means that a perl extension is treated like a shared library that provides also a C and an XS interface besides the perl one.

Package.Name: perl-extutils-depends

Package.Description: This module tries to make it easy to build Perl extensions that use functions and typemaps provided by other perl extensions. This means that a perl extension is treated like a shared library that provides also a C and an XS interface besides the perl one.
